## ILogFilePaths interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Information about the log files for an operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ILogFilePaths 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[error](./rush-lib.ilogfilepaths.error.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** The absolute path to the stderr text log. ANSI escape codes have been stripped.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[jsonl](./rush-lib.ilogfilepaths.jsonl.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** The absolute path to the JSONL log. ANSI escape codes are left intact to be able to reproduce the console output.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[jsonlFolder](./rush-lib.ilogfilepaths.jsonlfolder.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** The absolute path to the folder containing the JSONL log files. Provided as a convenience since it is an intermediary value of producing the jsonl log file path.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[text](./rush-lib.ilogfilepaths.text.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** The absolute path to the merged (interleaved stdout and stderr) text log. ANSI escape codes have been stripped.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[textFolder](./rush-lib.ilogfilepaths.textfolder.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** The absolute path to the folder containing the text log files. Provided as a convenience since it is an intermediary value of producing the text log file path.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
